title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, create, and run LLMs locally with a Modelfile.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, installable from PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) to use Ollama models as LLM & embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama with fluent API, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with generate, chat, and embeddings methods.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Simple React chat interface for Ollama using the ollama-js client.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama via REST API.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and docker-compose examples for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for running various LLMs with Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG setup using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints on top of Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in any channel or DM.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models as a Slack bot with thread support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.
